alert.note: Alert for Kauai Southwest; Molokai West; Waianae Coast (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 19 at 3:30PM HST until November 21 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... .A large north-northwest (340 degrees) swell will rise rapidly tonight and early Monday, bringing dangerously high surf to exposed north facing shores, and high surf to west facing shores. The swell will gradually diminish and turn more northerly on Tuesday. Wave heights at NDBC buoys 51001 and 51101 northwest of Kauai rose nearly 9 feet in two hours Sunday afternoon, thus a rapid increase in wave heights can be expected tonight. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST TUESDAY... * WHAT...High surf of 12 to 15 feet. * WHERE...West facing shores of Kauai, Oahu and Molokai. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Kauai Southwest; Molokai West; Waianae Coast
